data.eml:eml: A new species of Triepeolus (Hymenoptera: Apidae), with comments on T. utahensis (Cockerell) and T. melanarius Rightmyer

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Rightmyer, Molly G., Kono, Yoshiaki, Kohn, Joshua R., Hung, Keng-Lou James (2014): A new species of Triepeolus (Hymenoptera: Apidae), with comments on T. utahensis (Cockerell) and T. melanarius Rightmyer. Zootaxa 3872 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3872.1.4
